Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers have a 3-0 lead and will clinch with a victory.
New York has gone 44-37 at home and 94-68 overall.
The Yankees are 75-14 in games when they have more hits than their opponents.
Los Angeles is 46-35 in road games and 98-64 overall.
Dodgers hitters have a collective.335 on-base percentage, the second-ranked percentage in the NL.
The teams meet Tuesday for the seventh time this season. The Dodgers lead the season series 5-1.
The Yankees' Luis Gil (15-7, 3.50 ERA, 1.19 WHIP, 171 strikeouts) is scheduled to pitch against an undetermined Dodgers starter.
